mainText:
To Apple and Steve Jobs's Family,


Steve Jobs was a great mentor in many ways. His philosophy of technology 
inspired all of us.
His visionary and ideas of creativity live on, especially in the company 
that he truly loved.
Steve will be greatly missed by many people and he will be always in our 
hearts.
May our thoughts and condolences go to Steve's family and God bless them 
during this hard time of great sorrow.
author: Pheng
